description.raw:
Fixes printing an error message on a system that doesn't have pkg-config

```
CMake Error at /workspace/ws_ign/install_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnPkgConfig.cmake:48 (status):
  Unknown CMake command "status".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /workspace/ws_ign/install_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/FindUUID.cmake:19 (ign_pkg_check_modules)
  /workspace/ws_ign/install_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:145 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:76 (ign_find_package)
```
